media.caption: Whitney Houston performing on her My Love is Your Love Tour in Hamburg.

text.headline: The History of Machine Learning
text.text: Including important milestones in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

text.headline: A Machine that can think
text.text: Alan Turing developed his Turing Test to judge a computers intellegence and ability to replicate human thought.

text.headline: The Dartmouth Summer Research Project
text.text: Researcher John McCarthy led this great event to develop AI and coined the term 'artificial intelligence'. He and Marvin Minsky would prove to be leaders in this growing field.

text.headline: ELIZA
text.text: Eliza was the first AI-capable chatbot, developed at MIT by Joseph Weizenbaum.

media.caption: Shakey at the Computer History Museum

text.headline: Shakey the Robot
text.text: Shakey was the first general-purpose robot able to intelligently make dicisions and reason about it's actions.

text.headline: The AI Winter
text.text: Major questions were being asked about AI and limitations were stopping progress from occuring, including an insufficient about of computing power.

text.headline: The Expert System
text.text: Expert systems were the first commercially susccessful versions of AI, leading to a increase in attention towards neural networks.

text.headline: Today
text.text: AI is now a part of our everyday lives and have taken a massive affect on the world.
